properties.description: Select a three letter iso639-2b language code from http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php
properties.title: Language

properties.description: Create subject chains of the form 'Element1--Element2--Element3--...---ElementN'
properties.title: Subject Chain

properties.description: Enter date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Date Created/Issued

properties.description: Enter date in the format YYYY-MM.
properties.title: Date Captured (Digidate)

properties.description: A designation of a particular physical presentation of a resource, including the physical form or medium of material for a resource.
properties.title: Form

properties.description: Should be entered in the format "extent : other physical details ; dimensions"
properties.title: Extent

properties.description: Use the note types from http://www.loc.gov/standards/mods/mods-notes.html#source as a way to provide more context to your notes.
properties.title: Type
